page.title: 16MR LIDDLE VICAR OF FIRBECK
page.content: {Mr Liddle}is the vicar for {Woodsetts,Letwell and Firbeck.}Mr Liddle said that he usually gives three services on a Sunday but it is very rare that he does any more services in the weekend. Mr Liddle has been a vicar{21 years.}He used to be a teacher and he taught physics.He used to do about {120 funerals}in a year but he only does about{20 {funerals}in Woodsetts because not many people die in a year because it is in a smaller parish.Mr Liddle has a choir in Woodsetts and they are trying to find a choir for Firbeck.They haven't got a choir in Letwell.Mr Liddle is a Christian.To be a good Christian he has to read the Bible a lot and talk to God in his own way and to respect people.He feels that he is more than just a Christian because he teaches about God in his services.
